      • mix

        public static final float mix(float pX,
        float pY,
        float pMix)
        Parameters:
        pX -
        pY -
        pMix - [0...1]
        Returns:
        pX * (1 - pMix) + pY * pMix

      • mix

        public static final int mix(int pX,
      int pY,
      float pMix)
        Parameters:
        pX -
        pY -
        pMix - [0...1]
        Returns:
        (int)Math.round(pX * (1 - pMix) + pY * pMix)
